Author: apple_buns
Text: Are you me lol? I live in oversized t-shirts, sweaters and huge scarves when I can. Summer is terrible for me because everything in stores is always in such bright colors and super fitted...

Author: nnneow
Text: I want an oversized knitted sweater with long sleeves that get a lilâ€™ puffy toward the bottoms then pinch off a bit at the hands.  Then I want my legs to be sticks coming out the bottom with comfy thigh highs, or comfy slippers.   A comfy scarf and long hair with a slouchy beanie.   Sigh :(
